item.title: Using the Angular 2 CLI with .NET Core 1.0 and Visual Studio 2015
item.description: Before the current revision, this web site was most recently written in Angular 2. That was in April 2016, when Angular 2 was still in beta. I created it quite manually - not even knowing the Angular 2 CLI existed. I have rewritten it now that Angular 2 is RTM, using Angular CLI Beta 15. The site now also uses .NET Core, and it's all comprised in a Visual Studio 2015 solution. It's not easy to get all these things working together, so he's my first attempt at an actual blog to share some knowledge...
